ThingDef.label: heater full
ThingDef.description: A device that converts electricity into heat. It can automatically turn itself on or off to reach a specific target temperature.

ThingDef.label: heater full red
ThingDef.description: A device that converts electricity into heat. It can automatically turn itself on or off to reach a specific target temperature.

ThingDef.label: heater full redG
ThingDef.description: A device that converts electricity into heat. It can automatically turn itself on or off to reach a specific target temperature.

ThingDef.label: wind turbine ten
ThingDef.description: A wind-powered electrical generator. Requires a large clear space in front and behind for optimal air flow.

ThingDef.label: battery Ten
ThingDef.description: Stores electricity for later use. Charged batteries explode when exposed to rain or fire.

ThingDef.label: battery Hundred
ThingDef.description: Stores electricity for later use. Charged batteries explode when exposed to rain or fire.

ThingDef.label: VinnyCowCold MW
ThingDef.description: Vinny cow get milk and wool

ThingDef.label: VinnyCowCold IJ Med
ThingDef.description: Vinny cow get InsectJelly and MedicineUltratech

ThingDef.label: VinnyCowColdPlast
ThingDef.description: Vinny cow get InsectJelly and MedicineUltratech

ThingDef.label: horseA
ThingDef.description: A large hoofed mammal with a short coat, a long mane, and a long tail. Horses have been domesticated since ancient times.\n\nWhen in a caravan, people can ride horses to increase the caravan's speed.

ThingDef.label: sun lamp HP
ThingDef.description: An industrial lamp which lights an area brightly enough to grow crops, but consumes a huge amount of power. Automatically turns itself off at night.

ThingDef.Name: WallLight
ThingDef.label: WallLight
ThingDef.description: (cheat) An impassable wall with light. Capable of holding up a roof.
